page.title: Aleksandar Stanisic
page.description: Aleksandar Stanisic web presentation, young Web Developer from Serbia

problem.oldIE: You are using old and unsecured version of web browser, please download modern web browser.

about.content: Hi, I'm Aleksandar, student (for another couple of months) and web developer from Belgrade, currently building web apps and working out, while still trying to enjoy in youth. I'm also sometimes funny and interesting, but not too often.
